Module com.game
Package com.game.controllers

Class OptionsController

java.lang.Object
com.game.controllers.MenuController
com.game.controllers.OptionsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.almasb.fxgl.ui.UIController, Modeled
public class OptionsController extends MenuController
The controller for the option's menu, works from high_scores.fxml.
Author:
Alfie Rushby
